notes: When an [[Iks Chuka]], [[Iks Aucar]] or [[Iks Pututu]] dies near one of the Crossed Spears in [[Iksupan]], there's a chance that 5 Iks Churrascan spawn. Once all 5 Churrascan are killed, one [[Iks Ahpututu]] will spawn. Note that the Churrascan only last for some seconds before disappearing if not killed.
name: Iks Churrascan
strategy: Kill it fast before it disappears.
